articles.description: Oshae Brissett creates space off a pump fake and drives to convert a vicious one-handed dunk.
articles.headline: Cuse's Brissett soars for emphatic one-handed slam

images.caption: Oshae Brissett creates space off a pump fake and drives to convert a vicious one-handed dunk.
images.name: Cuse's Brissett soars for emphatic one-handed slam

articles.description: ESPN's Sean Farnham and Tom Hart reenact Vanderbilt guard Riley LaChance's buzzer beater to beat Mississippi State at Memorial Gymnasium.
articles.headline: Farnham, Hart reenact LaChance's game-winner

images.caption: ESPN's Sean Farnham and Tom Hart reenact Vanderbilt guard Riley LaChance's buzzer beater to beat Mississippi State at Memorial Gymnasium.
images.name: Farnham, Hart reenact LaChance's game-winner

articles.description: Miami's Ja'Quan Newton tries taking it to the paint for a layup but is rejected by Syracuse's Paschal Chukwu.
articles.headline: Chukwu denies Newton inside

images.caption: Miami's Ja'Quan Newton tries taking it to the paint for a layup but is rejected by Syracuse's Paschal Chukwu.
images.name: Chukwu denies Newton inside

articles.description: Kansas coach Bill Self discusses his program's consistency and the challenges the Jayhawks are facing in trying to win their 14th consecutive Big 12 title.
articles.headline: Self: Harder to win Big 12 this year over previous seasons

images.caption: Kansas coach Bill Self discusses his program's consistency and the challenges the Jayhawks are facing in trying to win their 14th consecutive Big 12 title.
images.name: Self: Harder to win Big 12 this year over previous seasons

articles.description: Jay Williams has help from a young fan dressed like James Naismith as he makes his pick for the Big-12 showdown between West Virginia and Kansas.
articles.headline: Williams, Naismith Kid make WVU-Kansas picks

images.caption: Jay Williams has help from a young fan dressed like James Naismith as he makes his pick for the Big-12 showdown between West Virginia and Kansas.
images.name: Williams, Naismith Kid make WVU-Kansas picks

articles.description: Jay Williams, Jay Bilas and Seth Greenberg weigh in on the impact of an ongoing FBI investigation into college basketball on bribes and corruption.
articles.headline: Greenberg not expecting 'massive changes' from FBI investigation

images.caption: Jay Williams, Jay Bilas and Seth Greenberg weigh in on the impact of an ongoing FBI investigation into college basketball on bribes and corruption.
images.name: Greenberg not expecting 'massive changes' from FBI investigation
